history.action: üëî GO/NO-GO DECISION MEMO (C456) ‚Äî Pre-drafted docs/business/go-nogo-decision-memo-c456.md with full evidence: 6/6 MUST ‚úÖ, T-5/T-3 verification tables, risk matrix, post-decision actions, NO-GO contingencies.
